Translations.Text: ‘allah hacchena ‘samada' [1] (tini karo mukhapeksi nana, sakale'i tamra mukhapeksi)
tini ka'uke'o janma denani ebam tamke'o janma deya hayani
Baluna [1], ‘ami asraya prarthana karachi [2] usara rabera
tini ya srsti karechena tara anista hate
ara anista hate ratera andhakarera, yakhana ta gabhira haya
ara anista hate samasta naridera, yara giraya phumka deya
ara anista hate hinsukera [1], yakhana se hinsa kare [2].’
Baluna, ‘ami asraya prarthana karachi manusera rabera
jinera madhya theke ebam manusera madhya theke [1].’
